listAsq.title: How do you value scooters?
listAsq.content: Our online valuation process is streamlined for your convenience. Simply contact us through any messaging platform (Telegram, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger) or social network (Instagram, Facebook) and send us photos along with a brief description (specifications, details, modifications). Within 5-7 minutes, you'll receive a competitive offer and a step-by-step plan for a quick sale.

listAsq.title: Can I sell a damaged scooter?
listAsq.content: Yes, we are prepared to make an offer on scooters in any condition.

listAsq.title: What paperwork is needed?
listAsq.content: Documentation is not mandatory for the sale. We purchase scooters both with and without papers. However, if you have documentation, we welcome its inclusion.

listAsq.title: Do you operate throughout the entire United States?
listAsq.content: While our network doesn't currently cover the entire United States, we are interested in working with customers from various regions. We're willing to arrange pickup or postal delivery of the scooter if necessary. Please note that for more distant locations, the waiting time for our appraiser's arrival may increase by 1-2 days. We strive to provide quality service to every customer, regardless of location.

listAsq.title: Do you offer pickup services?
listAsq.content: We offer three convenient transportation options for your scooter. You can deliver it to our office yourself, we can send our employee to your location for evaluation and transportation, or you have the option to ship the scooter by mail. All of these services are provided at no additional cost to you.

listAsq.title: How does the inspection process work?
listAsq.content: The final verification occurs during the appraiser's visit or upon receipt of the scooter. If you accurately disclosed all details during the initial assessment via messenger, the price typically remains unchanged upon inspection. Payment is processed immediately following this step.
